Your doctor's recommendation makes medical sense. A persistent cough lasting 6 weeks with a nodule visible on X-ray does warrant further investigation, even when it's likely benign. Your doctor has likely seen many similar cases and knows that most nodules in people with recent pneumonia are indeed benign scar tissue, but the responsible approach is to verify this.

That said, you could ask your doctor about the specific characteristics of your nodule (size, appearance, location) and whether there are any factors that make her particularly confident it's benign. Sometimes additional context can provide reassurance.
